name: Fuel Inc - Builder Game
description:
Ever wanted to manage your own gas station and sell the most fuel for the highest price? This is your chance! Fuel Inc offers unique sim building options and allows you to expand from a single gas pump station into a million dollar all-round service station. Combined with cool looking graphics and nice audio this is a must have for every fan of the sim building & management genre.

Can you build a million dollar service station and sell the most fuel? Give it a try now!
